name: Fancy Latest Post Widget
author: Juan Mojica

sections.description:
Display the latest post with Animated effects in your sidebar or content.

Select an animation effect and Style for the Post Thumbnail, Title, Content and Read More Button.

So far the only plugin that allow you to add an animation and Color for the post thumbnail, post title, post content and read more button.

Please find a demo of the plugin Here
sections.installation:
1- Unzip the downloaded fancy-latest-post-widget zip file
2- Upload the fancy-latest-post-widget folder and its contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
3- Activate Fancy Latest Posts Widget from Plugins page

Implement

1) Go to the Appearance / Widgets tab and make new instance of this widget as many time as you wish.
sections.changelog:
version 1.3.9: Added the option to exclude post and categories by ID, also configured the backend layout to use less vertical space.

version 1.3.7: Fixed the jQuery conflicts with the themes and other plugins.

version 1.2.6: Added a custom CSS area, removed the Aligment dropdown and added a smart screen width detector to display 1, 2 or 4 post per row depending of the space available

version 1.2.5: Added the option to select CSS color for title, content, and Read More Button.

version 1.2.0: Did small Adjustment to the readme and JS files.

version 1.0: First Version of the plugin.
